snippet.title: Pumpkin Power!
snippet.description: * Pumpkin Power! Talking about Halloween yesterday put me in the mood for one of my favorite fall flavors - pumpkin. Pumpkins aren't only "gourd-eous" (hee-hee), they're nutrition powerhouses - and they don't even need to be fresh.I call this smoothie "liquid pumpkin...

snippet.title: Recipe of the Week: Pumpkin Pudding
snippet.description: * Recipe of the Week: Pumpkin Pudding It's still the time of year for pumpkins and you may be surprised how highly nutritious they are. They are loaded with beta-carotene (gives them their bright orange flesh) and are an excellent source of potassium, iron and fiber; key nutrients that w...

snippet.title: November is Peanut Butter Lovers Month
snippet.description: * November is Peanut Butter Lovers Month How do you like your peanut butter? Smeared on a sandwich with jelly, as a topping for apple slices, or plain right out of the jar? snippet.title: A Tribute to Oatmeal
snippet.description: * A Tribute to Oatmeal This past Monday marked National Oatmeal day, and what’s a better way to celebrate than a warm bowl of oats in the morning? Growing up I’d have instant oatmeal in the car ride to school. My mom wasn’t a huge fan of oatmeal, or so she thought, and the...

snippet.title: Allergy-Free Apple Spice Coffee Cake
snippet.description: * Allergy-Free Apple Spice Coffee Cake Chia seeds make a great substitute for eggs in baked goods. snippet.title: Happy Thanksgiving!
